comment: Derivation of impsingle-peirce ( ~ peirce ) from ~ ax-mp and ~ impsingle . It is step 28 in Lukasiewicz. (Contributed by Larry Lesyna and Jeffrey P. Machado, 2-Aug-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
